name: Bert Hogue
overview:
Bert Hogue, Chief Financial Officer, has more than 25 years of experience in public accounting and as Chief Financial Officer for technology companies ranging start-up to middle market in size and from private, venture-backed to public ownership. 



Following 14 years at KPMG LLP in its Seattle and New York offices, Hogue has held leadership positions at Wetpaint.com, Who’s Calling, Epoch Biosciences, Apex Learning, Verio, and NorthWestNet. In his CFO roles, Hogue has had a broad range of externally facing responsibilities including significant experience with mergers and acquisition and in the public and private debt and equity markets. 



Hogue received his bachelors degree in business administration from the University of Puget Sound.
